job.title: Automotive Test Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Role Automotive Test Engineer</strong></p><p><strong>Work location Peachtree City, Georgia</strong></p><p><strong>Duration: 6-12 Months (Possible CTH after 3 Months)</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Required skills:</strong></p><p>• Bachelor\'s degree in Computer/Electronics/Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or related</p><p>• 2+ years of relevant experience in executing a test plan, identify gaps and developing simple test cases</p><p>• 2+ years of relevant experience in Automotive Domain Testing</p><p>• 2+ years of relevant experience in Automation Testing</p><p>• Experience in software testing for infotainment system or consumer electronics products</p><p>• Must have knowledge and experience of types of testing (e.g. normal, boundary, abnormal, load testing)</p>
